snippet.title: HUMANKIND™ - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
HUMANKIND™ is Amplitude Studios’ historical 4X strategy game where you combine cultures through six different eras to become the most famous empire in history.

Buy now: https://bit.ly/3sDKTxw

Follow HUMANKIND on social media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/humankindgame​
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/humankindgame​
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/amplitudestudios​
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/humankindgame
